H0.text: Which “Thom” is Radiohead’s lead singer and principal songwriter. Thom Yorke

H1.text: Which “Thom” is Radiohead’s lead singer and principal songwriter. Thom Bell

H2.text: Which “Thom” is Radiohead’s lead singer and principal songwriter. Thomas Dolby

H3.text: Which “Thom” is Radiohead’s lead singer and principal songwriter. Tchock

A4.text: Thomas Edward Yorke (born 7 October 1968) is an English musician who is the singer and main songwriter of the rock band Radiohead.
